name: Rural Health Care Foundation
briefDescription: Rural Health Care Foundation(RHCF) is an NGO providing primary health care services to the underprivileged community residing in the densely populated remotest areas of rural India.  RHCF operates through a chain of primary health care unit spread across 4 districts of West Bengal, India Viz Nadia, Bardhaman, South 24 Parganas and North 24 Parganas.
